A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was a let down\, and how do you come up with 90% with an average rating of 8.1 out of 10\, that's some serious rounding. Audience score of 48%. It had a few good parts\, the time on the island\, 10\, any time on enemy ships\, 10\, time in the casino\, 9\, the rest of it\, seemed like it was created in a conference room by marketers\, serious let down.
